import axios from "axios" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import Image from "next/image" import Link from "next/link" export default function Products(props) { let category = props.category const [products, setProducts] = useState([]) const [filters, setFilters] = useState([]) const [page, setPage] = useState(0) const [total, setTotal] = useState() const limit = 5 useEffect(() => { let queryParams = { limit: limit, offset: page } queryParams = new URLSearchParams(queryParams) axios.get(`${process.env.API_URL}category/products/${category.slug}?${queryParams}`).then((response) => { console.log(response) setProducts(response.data.rows) setTotal(response.data.count) }).catch(error => { console.log(error) }) }, [page]) return (
